Kota Kinabalu.description: Capital city of Sabah, known for its vibrant markets and waterfront.

attractions.name: Gaya Street
attractions.desc: Famous Sunday market with local food, crafts, and souvenirs.

attractions.name: Signal Hill Observatory
attractions.desc: Best city view and sunset spot in Kota Kinabalu.

attractions.name: Sabah Art Gallery
attractions.desc: Modern art museum showcasing local artists.

attractions.name: Muzium Sabah
attractions.desc: Museum of Sabah's history and culture.

attractions.name: Tanjung Aru Beach
attractions.desc: Popular beach for sunset and picnics.

Kinabatangan.description: Home to the Kinabatangan River and amazing wildlife experiences.

attractions.name: Kinabatangan River Cruise
attractions.desc: River cruise for wildlife spotting: proboscis monkeys, orangutans, and more.

attractions.name: Poring Hot Springs
attractions.desc: Natural hot springs and canopy walk.

attractions.name: Mari Mari Cultural Village
attractions.desc: Experience traditional Sabahan culture and food.

Sipadan.description: World-famous diving destination with crystal clear waters.

attractions.name: Pulau Sipadan
attractions.desc: Top diving spot in Malaysia, known for turtles and barracuda.

Tawau.description: Gateway to Tawau Hills Park and lush rainforest.

attractions.name: Tawau Hills Park
attractions.desc: Rainforest park with waterfalls and giant trees.
